intro: Select a code or a phenotype to display the relevant classification and hierarchical structure.
title: Data

intro: Legend to allow comparison, ICD-9 and ICD-10-cm codes are shown in separate colors.
title: Legend

intro:
- Hover on a wedge to see the label of the code.
- Click on a wedge to expand/collaspe the hierarchy.
- Move the mouse to the upper right corner, click to download png.
title: Sunburst

intro:
- Hover on a node to see the label of the code.
- Click on a node to expand/collaspe the subtree.
- Set the maxdepth to 9 to see the full tree in Setting.
title: Tree

intro:
The Controller of the plots:
Set the max-depth of the plots.
title: Setting
